'''Pankration''' was a form of competitive wrestling and martial combat practiced in the country of [[Chessenta]] within the [[Old Empires]] region of [[east Faer√ªn]].
document_data.History: This brutal sport involved direct competition between two participants. A victor was declared only when one of the combatants was knocked unconscious. Matches were observed by [[priest]]s that ''[[heal]]ed'' all physical harm sustained during a bout. The only illegal moves were biting, eye-gouging, and breaking fingers. Pankration tournaments involved bouts of winners facing winners until only one participant was left standing.
